name: Aunt Linda's Crusted Pork Chops
ingredients: 1 thick boneless pork chop, preferably with a little fat on it, about 6 ounces
1 ounce parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup (the kind in a can)

instructions.en: Place pork chop in a greased baking dish. Season liberally on both sides.
instructions.sk: Vložte bravčovú kotletu do vymastenej zapekacej misky. Dôkladne ochuťte z oboch strán.
instructions.ja: グリースを塗ったベーキング皿に豚肉を置きます。両面に十分な調味料をふります。

instructions.en: Top pork chop with mayonnaise, then parmesan cheese.
instructions.sk: Na bravčovú kotletu naneste majonézu a potom parmezán.
instructions.ja: 豚肉の上にマヨネーズを塗り、その上にパルメザンチーズをかけます。

instructions.en: Place a thin onion slice on top and add a pat of butter if desired.
instructions.sk: Na vrch položte tenký plátok cibule a podľa chuti pridajte kúsok masla.
instructions.ja: 上に薄切りの玉ねぎを置き、お好みでバターを少量のせます。

instructions.en: Bake uncovered at 350-375°F (175-190°C) for about 40 minutes or until meat is done. Check after 35-40 minutes.
instructions.sk: Pečte nezakryté pri teplote 175-190°C asi 40 minút alebo kým nie je mäso hotové. Skontrolujte po 35-40 minútach.
instructions.ja: 350-375°F（175-190°C）のオーブンで蓋をせずに約40分、または肉が焼けるまで調理します。35-40分後に確認してください。

notes: Makes 1 serving. Can be frozen. Original recipe suggests 1 hour cooking time, but it's recommended to check earlier, around 35-40 minutes.
